{"id":520036445,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1625879246,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/520036445/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Unsorted Continuous Subarray","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findUnsortedSubarray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int m=nums.size();\n        int l=0,r=0;\n        for(int i=1;i<m;i++){\n            if(nums[i]<nums[i-1]){\n                l=min(l,i-1);\n                r=max(r,i);\n            }\n        }\n        if(l==0 && r!=0 && r==m-1) return m;\n        return r-l;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-unsorted-continuous-subarray"}
